nodes.text: The ancient city established by the Je'daii Order to support Vur Tepe was located on the planet Tython. It was in ruins by the time of the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. The city was built just north of the mouth of the Tythos River and northwest of the Je'daii temple-city Kaleth. During the Flesh Raider uprising, the native Flesh Raiders of Tython occupied the ruins while forming an army under Grand Chieftain Keshk and the Dark Jedi Bengel Morr.
